messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 804
messages.msgSnippet: Nancy Song wrote: Nicole Brown  wrote: When I had my babies It was a trust in God not to vaccinate.It felt like everyone wanted to test,
messages.messageBody:
Nancy Song wrote:

"Nicole Brown <nbrown@...> wrote:
When I had my babies It was a trust in God not to vaccinate.It felt like
everyone wanted to test, poke and scare me into putting something into
there perfect little bodies. I went to the father, told him my troubles,
and his wisdom I depended on.We can't possiably know all the junk.God
has helped me with all these kinds of things because I trust in him. "

Whoops! Just wanted to clear something up here... I did not say this. I
appreciate your viewpoint, Nancy, but please be more careful with your
attributions. Thanks!

Nicole
